txt.en: Tugging on this chain does not seem to accomplish anything. You tug on it again....

'So! It was not an old wives' tale after all? The Great Avanc was indeed responsible for the disappearances of many of the folk of Barnavon.\n\n'You have my thanks, [placeholder], for disposing of this problem.'

Lhun Avanc is said to be the lair of the Great Avanc, a creature of legend to the Dunlendings of Carreglyn. The beast is said to use deception to draw its victims near to the water, then it grabs them and drags them under to their deaths.
You have been ambushed by the Great Avanc!
The Great Avanc is at its lair in Lhun Avanc.\n\nYou should defeat the Great Avanc, terror of Carreglyn.
Gwilum is at Barnavon, north of Lhun Avanc.\n\nYou should tell Gwilum of the death of the Great Avanc.
